name: A Slime Story
description:
A Slime story is a free to play mobile RPG where you play the role of the typical first enemy of most RPG's, A slime. In this story you are introduced to an outcast slime, left for dead from his community of slimes for being colorless. He wanders into a town, helpless barely hanging on to life. You must assist the slime to find his true colors and learn all his abilities and transformations.

A Slime Story features fun arcade like gameplay, online learderboards, anime characters/story, quests, unlockable skills, and unlockeable characters!

Unlock different pet slime evolutions to learn their skills. Try different skills on different pets to try and get as far as possible and climb your way to the top of the online leaderboards. Hidden loot and random monster drops.

This is one of the androids RPG games free from popup or banner ads that are annoying. I only use optional video ads to support this game.
